name: Pegasus Survival Simulator 3D
description:
Have you ever dreamed of having a beautiful flying Pegasus? Pegasus Survival Simulator 3D will make your dream comes true! You will have a sympathetic flying horse, but it won’t be a magic fairytale, it will be an epic and realistic struggle! The servants of darkness came from another world to your World of Magic and brought war to your kingdom! Save the World of Magic, stop the enemies’ intervention and stay alive as long as possible in Pegasus Survival Simulator 3D!

Start to raising up the characteristics of your flying horse and buy power-ups to made it stronger! Earn points and customize your pegasus to make it unique! Choose gender, name, shape of horn and color and have fun playing Pegasus Survival Simulator 3D – great game for those who loves animal simulators! Create your own clan of unicorns and save the world from Darkness with Pegasus Survival Simulator 3D!

Enjoy the funniest flying horse adventure, explore forests and plains to recruit new foals and horses to your herd! Be a beautiful magic animal, ride into forests and fields to find food, protect you and your family from angry animals, and struggle with enemies to save the World of Magic from the evil curse with Pegasus Survival Simulator 3D!

Pegasus Survival Simulator 3D features:
- Beautiful magic world full of wild pegasuses
- Many unusual predators to struggle with
- Great chance to fulfil your childish fantasy
- Different ways to customize your flying horse
- Interactive 3D world – it looks like fairytale
- Two game modes - story mode & survival mode

Fullfil your childish fantasy and have your own wild pegasus! Help your flying horse to stay alive and save this beautiful world!
